plateau.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a large area of flat land that is higher than the land around it
plateau.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a period during which the level of something does not change, especially after a period when it was increasing
plateau.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Inflation rates have reached a plateau.
plateau.translation[1].definitions[0].de: if something plateaus, it reaches and then stays at a particular level
plateau.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The athletic footwear market has not yet plateaued.
plateau.translation[2].definitions[0].de: if something plateaus, it reaches and then stays at a particular level
plateau.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: The athletic footwear market has not yet plateaued.
plateau.translation[3].definitions[0].de: a period during which the level of something does not change, especially after it has been increasing
plateau.translation[3].definitions[0].ex: The rate of inflation has reached a plateau.
